alert.note: Alert for Chatanika River Valley; Eielson AFB and Salcha; Fairbanks Metro Area; Goldstream Valley and Nenana Hills; Nenana; Tanana Flats; Two Rivers; Upper Chena River Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 09 at 5:36AM AKDT until October 10 at 7:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph over the higher terrain. * WHERE...Fairbanks and surrounding areas. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 7 AM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will begin in time to impact evening commuters today.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Chatanika River Valley; Eielson AFB and Salcha; Fairbanks Metro Area; Goldstream Valley and Nenana Hills; Nenana; Tanana Flats; Two Rivers; Upper Chena River Valley
